def: Of or pertaining to a hilum.
Pertaining to, or designed for, wear; as, wearing apparel.
A storm accompanied with lightning and thunder.
To make a peroration; to harangue. [Colloq.]
The act or process of reducing. See Reduce, v. t., 6. and Toreduce an equation, To reduce an expression, under Reduce, v. t.
The actual appearance of an angel to man.
Cotton prepared in sheets or rolls for quilting, upholstering,and similar purposes.
Tissue-producing; connected with the formation and developmentof the organic tissues.
To weep over; to deplore; to bedew with tears. "His timelessdeath beweeping." Drayton.
To produce or render extemporaneous compositions, especially inverse or in music, without previous preparation; hence, to doanything offhand.
